trans-unit.source: The data type of the first <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> passed to the <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityAction`3" />.
trans-unit.target: Tipo di dati del primo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> passato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityAction`3" />.

trans-unit.source: The data type of the second <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> passed to the <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityAction`3" />.

trans-unit.source: The data type of the third <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> passed to the <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityAction`3" />.
trans-unit.target: Tipo di dati del terzo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> passato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityAction`3" />.
Richiama il gestore <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityAction`3" /> di una attività.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.InvokeAction`3" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.InvokeAction`3" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityAction`3" /> invoked by this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.InvokeAction`3" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityAction`3" /> richiamato da questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.InvokeAction`3" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> passed to the associated <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityAction`3" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il primo <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> passato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityAction`3" /> associato.

trans-unit.target: Il secondo <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> passato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityAction`3" /> associato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the third <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> passed to the associated <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityAction`3" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il terzo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> passato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityAction`3" /> associato.
